404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

data-chart.no-active-products: You don't have any active packages yet. You can purchase a package on the <ion-text class="link">purchase page</ion-text>.

payment-processor.product-validation-info: The product validation process will begin only after the internet is used for the first time (1 KB).

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to our app. This Privacy Policy explains how your data is collected, used, and shared when you use our app.

information-we-collect.title: Information We Collect
items: Account Information: Name, email address, and phone number.
Usage Data: Internet package usage, purchase history, and in-app activity.
Payment Information: Details processed securely by third-party providers.

use-of-information.title: How We Use Your Information
use-of-information.text: We use your data to provide app functionality, monitor app performance, and process transactions securely.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access, correct, or delete your personal information.
Contact us regarding your data privacy concerns.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions, please contact us at support@1-esim.com

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to our app. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our app.

rules.title: Rules and Guidelines
items: You must use the app in compliance with all applicable laws.
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions, please contact us at support@1-esim.com.
